episodes.title: Panimals
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig is joined by Alan Davies, Danny Baker, Phill Jupitus and actress Teri Hatcher to look at animals which start with the letter P as the quite interesting quiz returns for a sixteenth series.

episodes.title: Peril
episodes.plot: Comedians Aisling Bea, Lee Mack and Jason Manford join host Sandi Toksvig and regular panellist Alan Davies to look at the topic of peril.

episodes.title: Piecemeal
episodes.plot: Pie-eating, pizza-making and silent P's are among the topics looked at piecemeal as Sandi and Alan are joined by Gyles Brandreth, Jimmy Carr and Sally Phillips.

episodes.title: Parts
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig looks at various parts with Sara Pascoe, Ed Balls, Johnny Vegas and regular panellist Alan Davies.

episodes.title: Public & Private
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig delves into the public and the private with her guests Bridget Christie, Victoria Coren Mitchell, Phill Jupitus and regular panelist Alan Davies, who reveals a shameful secret about himself.

episodes.title: Pictures
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig looks at pictures with Alan Davies, Noel Fielding, Hannah Gadsby and Joe Lycett.

episodes.title: Picnics
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig enjoys a picnic with Alan Davies, Richard Osman, Rachel Parris and Romesh Ranganathan.

episodes.title: Plants
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig looks at plants with regular panellist Alan Davies and guests, Sara Pascoe, Stephen K. Amos and Jason Manford.

episodes.title: Pubs
episodes.plot: Host Sandi Toksvig has a festive knees-up down the pub with bar-stool regular Alan Davies and guest ales Cariad Lloyd, Noel Fielding and Josh Widdicombe.

episodes.title: Pain and Punishment
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig and Alan Davies are joined by Lee Mack, Alice Levine and Jimmy Carr to learn about some unusual and sometimes painful punishments.

episodes.title: Potpourri
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig examines a potpourri of quite interesting topics with regular panellist Alan Davies and their guests - comedians Phill Jupitus, Rhod Gilbert and Cally Beaton.

episodes.title: Procrastination
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig finds the time to indulge in a little procrastination with Alan Davies, comedians Aisling Bea and Holly Walsh and radio and television presenter Nikki Bedi.

episodes.title: Phenomena
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig investigates an array of phenomena with comedians Alan Davies, Cariad Lloyd, Josh Widdicombe and Paul Sinha.

episodes.title: Pathology
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig studies pathology with regular panellist Alan Davies, comedians Ed Byrne and Rhod Gilbert and actress Sindhu Vee.

episodes.title: Past Times
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig looks at the pastimes of past times with Alan Davies, Joe Lycett, Phil Wang and Ellie Taylor.

episodes.title: Post
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig opens the post with her guests Alan Davies, Holly Walsh, Matt Lucas and Susan Calman. We see if Susan can fit inside a pillar box.

episodes.title: VG - Part One
episodes.plot: A selection of the best moments from the 'P' series of QI, hosted by Sandi Toksvig with Alan Davies and their guests.

episodes.title: VG - Part Two
episodes.plot: Sandi Toksvig dishes up a second helping of Very Good bits from the sixteenth series of the quite interesting panel show.
